title: Software Engineer
description:
**About Company** 
 :
 



  





 They balance innovation with an open, friendly culture and the backing of a long\\-established parent company, known for its ethical reputation. We guide customers from what’s now to what’s next by unlocking the value of their data and applications to solve their digital challenges, achieving outcomes that benefit both business and society.
 



  





**About Client:** 




  





 Our client is a global digital solutions and technology consulting company headquartered in Mumbai, India. The company generates annual revenue of over $4\\.29 billion (₹35,517 crore), reflecting a 4\\.4% year\\-over\\-year growth in USD terms. It has a workforce of around 86,000 professionals operating in more than 40 countries and serves a global client base of over 700 organizations.
 



 Our client operates across several major industry sectors, including Banking, Financial Services \\& Insurance (BFSI), Technology, Media \\& Telecommunications (TMT), Healthcare \\& Life Sciences, and Manufacturing \\& Consumer. In the past year, the company achieved a net profit of $553\\.4 million (₹4,584\\.6 crore), marking a 1\\.4% increase from the previous year. It also recorded a strong order inflow of $5\\.6 billion, up 15\\.7% year\\-over\\-year, highlighting growing demand across its service lines.
 



  





 Key focus areas include Digital Transformation, Enterprise AI, Data \\& Analytics, and Product Engineering—reflecting its strategic commitment to driving innovation and value for clients across industr
 **ies.** 




  





**We are looking for a candidate with 6 yrs of experience with below skill set** 




  





 1\\. Candidate should have strong Hands in MS SQL.
 



 2\\. Candidate should be comfortable writing complex queries.
 



 3\\. Candidate should have experience in performance optimization
 



 4\\. Candidate should have experience in slowly changing dimension (data warehousing)
 



 5\\. Candidate should have worked on Table Partition
 



 6\\. Candidate should have experience in creating indexes, Triggers.
 



 7\\. Candidate should be comfortable in writing joins
 



 8\\. Candidate should be comfortable in SQL concepts.
 



 9\\. Candidate should have hands on experience in SSIS. Creating SSIS package, understanding different control flow, transformation in Data Flow, Configuration, Loggin, Error Handling, Deployment and Scheduling.

title: Associate Software Engineer
description:
**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a passionate
 **Associate Java Developer (Fresher)** 
 to join our engineering team. This role is ideal for recent graduates who have strong fundamentals in Java programming and an eagerness to learn modern development practices. You will work closely with senior developers to build, test, and deploy high\\-quality applications.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Assist in designing, coding, testing, and debugging Java\\-based applications.
* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code under guidance.
* Work with frameworks such as Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and REST APIs (training will be provided).
* Participate in code reviews and follow best coding practices.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to understand requirements and deliver solutions.
* Support application deployment and work on minor bug fixes.
* Learn and adapt to new technologies as required.



  





**Required Skills** 



* Strong understanding of
 **Core Java** 
 , OOP concepts, collections, exception handling, and basic multithreading.
* Basic knowledge of
 **Spring / Spring Boot** 
 (academic or project experience).
* Understanding of
 **RESTful APIs** 
 and web services.
* Familiarity with SQL databases like MySQL/PostgreSQL.
* Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript is a plus.
* Good understanding of data structures and algorithms.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and willingness to learn.



  





**Preferred Skills** 



* Exposure to Git/GitHub version control.
* Basic understanding of Maven/Gradle.
* Internship experience or academic projects in Java.
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or related fields.
* Java certifications are an added advantage but not mandatory.

title: Full-Stack Development Intern
description:
**Full\\-Stack Development Intern** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Stipend:** 
 Up to ₹7,500 (Performance\\-Based)
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is committed to nurturing future\\-ready software developers through live projects, hands\\-on learning, and structured mentorship programs. The organization focuses on building strong front\\-end and back\\-end development capabilities aligned with real\\-world industry standards and modern web technologies.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Full\\-Stack Development Intern, you will gain end\\-to\\-end exposure to modern web application development. This role involves working across the complete development stack—from designing intuitive user interfaces to developing secure and scalable backend systems—making it ideal for candidates aspiring to become full\\-stack developers.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and deploy full\\-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB/MySQL
* Build and integrate RESTful APIs to ensure seamless communication between front\\-end and back\\-end systems
* Optimize applications for performance, security, and scalability
* Debug, test, and maintain codebases and repositories
* Collaborate with team members in an agile development environment
* Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement



**Eligibility \\& Requirements** 



* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js
* Working knowledge of databases such as MongoDB and MySQL
* Familiarity with REST APIs and version control tools like Git/GitHub
* Strong logical thinking and problem\\-solving abilities
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team\\-oriented environment



**What You Will Gain** 



* Performance\\-based stipend of up to ₹7,500
* Certificate of Internship upon successful completion
* End\\-to\\-end exposure to real\\-world software development projects
* Mentorship and technical guidance from industry professionals
* Opportunity to build and strengthen a full\\-stack development portfolio
* Potential full\\-time employment opportunity based on performance

title: SDE – Backend (Node.js)
description:
**Job Title :** 
 SDE – Backend (Node.js)
 



**Experience:** 
 5\\+ Years
 



**Duration :** 
 Long\\-Term (6 months)
 



**Location :** 
 Remote
 



  





 We are looking for an experienced Software Development Engineer – Backend (Node.js) to take ownership of designing and building scalable, high\\-performance backend systems. The ideal candidate will play a key role in developing robust APIs and microservices that power high\\-throughput, enterprise\\-grade applications.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Own backend modules end\\-to\\-end, from system design to production deployment
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices using Node.js
* Build backend services for real\\-time, high\\-throughput applications
* Optimize database schemas, queries, and overall system performance
* Design fault\\-tolerant, secure, and highly observable systems
* Collaborate closely with frontend, product, and platform teams
* Implement CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and performance benchmarks
* Troubleshoot complex production issues and perform root cause analysis
* Mentor junior engineers and contribute to architectural decisions



  





**Skills Required** 



* 5–9 years of backend engineering experience in large\\-scale, distributed systems
* Deep expertise in Node.js, including asynchronous programming and event\\-driven architecture
* Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design
* Hands\\-on experience designing RESTful APIs (GraphQL is a plus)
* Solid knowledge of database design, indexing, and performance tuning (MongoDB preferred)
* Experience with cloud platforms and containerized deployments
* Familiarity with message queues and event\\-driven systems
* Strong understanding of security best practices, authentication, and authorization
* Proficiency in at least one scripting language such as Python or Bash
* Ability to work effectively in fast\\-paced, ambiguous environments

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
***Dear Job Seekers,***




  





***Greetings from TATA Consultancy Services!!!***




***Hope you and your family are safe and well.***




  





**We are conducting face to face Interview for Full\\-Stack AI Engineer skill sets.** 




  





**If interested Kindly revert with your updated CV for further process with TCS.** 




  





**Walk In Drive Date: 31st Jan 2026 (Saturday), Hyderabad.** 




  





**Registration Time: 9\\.00 AM – 12\\.30 PM** 




  





**Venue\\-** 




**TCS Deccan Park,** 




**Plot No.1, Hitech City Main Rd,** 




**Software Units Layout, HUDA Techno Enclave,** 




**Madhapur, Hyderabad,** 




**Telangana, 500081\\.** 




  





**Job Title: Full\\-Stack AI Engineer** 




  





**Experience\\- 4 to 10 Years** 




  





**Location:\\- Hyderabad** 




  





**Job Summary** 



* As a Full\\-Stack AI Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying end\\-to\\-end AI\\-powered applications.
* You will collaborate with cross functional teams to implement scalable solutions, from model development to interactive user interfaces.
* The ideal candidate combines strong software engineering skills with hands\\-on experience in AI/ML technologies.



  





**Key Responsibilities**

 **APIs** 
 .
* Build responsive and user\\-friendly frontend applications. Integrate
 **AI/ML models** 
 into production systems.

 and automated testing frameworks.

 •Only Full Time courses would be considered.
 



  





 Things to carry for interview:
 



 1 copy of an updated resume, Government ID proof(and photocopy), 1 passport size photo, TCS Application Form.

title: Principal Software Engineer, ITC
description:
Who You’ll Work With
   

  

 At Nike, our mission is to leverage the power of advanced data and innovative technology to inspire and serve athletes\\* worldwide. You will be part of the Data \\& AI (DAI) team, a dynamic group at the heart of digital transformation. This team designs, builds, and maintains scalable, intelligent, and secure platforms that drive critical decision\\-making, personalized consumer experiences, and operational excellence throughout the global Nike ecosystem. Collaboration is key—expect to interact with talented engineers, data scientists, product managers, and global stakeholders who share a passion for excellence and innovation.
   

  

 Who We Are Looking For
   

  

 We are searching for a visionary and accomplished Principal Software Engineer to join our Tech Center in India. You are not only an expert in software architecture and engineering, AIML framework, but also a strategic thinker who can see the long\\-term impact of technology decisions. Your experience allows you to guide teams through ambiguity, set clear technical standards, and shape the future of Nike’s data\\-driven platforms. You thrive in a fast\\-paced environment where cross\\-functional collaboration, creativity, and agility are essential. You have a demonstrated history of successfully leading engineering teams, delivering innovative solutions, and driving organizational change at scale.
   

  

**Skillsets And Required Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering,


 Information Technology, or a related field.
   

  

* 12\\+ years of progressive experience in software engineering, with at least 5 years in a senior leadership or principal engineer capacity.
* Extensive expertise in building, deploying, and scaling sophisticated data platforms, distributed systems, and cloud\\-native architectures (preferably with AWS, Azure, or GCP).
* Advanced proficiency in one or more programming languages: Python, Java, Scala, Go, or C\\+\\+.
* Comprehensive knowledge of data engineering, data analytics, machine learning


 infrastructure, and big data technologies (e.g., Apache Spark, Kafka, Hadoop,
   

  

 Databricks).
   

  

* Strong track record with modern DevOps methodologies, automation, CI/CD


 pipelines, and infrastructure as code (IaC).
   

  

* A strong familiarity and development experiences with agentic workflow and AI/LLM powered enterprise applications.
* Exceptional communication, leadership, and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to influence and inspire at all levels of the organization.
* Experience driving and managing complex, high\\-impact technology projects in a fast\\- paced, agile environment.
* Deep understanding of security and compliance best practices in large\\-scale


 enterprise environments.
   

  

* Demonstrated commitment to fostering diversity and inclusion in engineering teams.


 What You Will Work On
   

  

* Lead the architectural vision, technical design, and implementation of complex,


 large\\-scale data and AI platforms, ensuring they are robust, secure, and highly
   

  

 performant.
   

  

* Champion best practices in software development, data engineering, and cloud


 infrastructure, setting high standards for code quality, reliability, and maintainability across multiple engineering teams.
   

  

* Mentor and coach senior engineers, fostering a culture of technical excellence,


 intellectual curiosity, and continuous growth. Provide thought leadership to enable
   

  

 teams to solve challenging engineering problems.
   

  

* Collaborate extensively with global product and business stakeholders to translate strategic goals into actionable technology roadmaps, align engineering efforts with business priorities, and deliver exceptional value to Nike’s customers and partners.
* Drive adoption of modern engineering methodologies, including automation,


 continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD), DevOps practices, test\\-driven
   

  

 development, and agile frameworks to accelerate innovation and delivery.
   

  

* Evaluate, recommend, and integrate emerging technologies, frameworks, and tools to strengthen Nike’s technology ecosystem and maintain our position as an industry leader.
* Oversee the end\\-to\\-end lifecycle of critical projects, from requirements gathering


 and solution design, to implementation, monitoring, and optimization.
   

  

* Ensure all platforms and services meet stringent security, privacy, and compliance standards, proactively identifying and mitigating risks.
* Represent the Tech Center in India as a senior technical ambassador, collaborating with global teams, sharing expertise, and contributing to Nike’s worldwide


 engineering community.
   

  

* If you are passionate about transforming the future of sport and technology and want to make a meaningful impact on athletes around the globe, we invite you to join our team and help shape Nike’s data\\-powered journey.

title: C++ Developer (TCP/IP, Socket Programming)_Hughes Systique
description:
**System / C\\+\\+ Engineer (Integrated Skills)** 




  





**Hughes Systique Corporation (HSC)** 
 , a leading global digital solutions and service provider, is expanding its team in Dehradun, Uttarakhand. This is a great opportunity for System/ C\\+\\+ Engineers (Integrated Skills) to work on cutting\\-edge projects with a multinational company—right here in Dehradun.
 



  





**IKSANA** 
 is supporting
 **Hughes Systique Corporation** 
 in this recruitment. 
 



  





**Note** 
 : This is a Dehradun\\-based position (Full\\-Time, Work from Office)
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 We are looking for engineers with strong system\\-level C/C\\+\\+ programming skills and exposure to complex, high\\-performance engineering environments. The role involves working on mission\\-critical systems, end\\-to\\-end integration, debugging, and performance\\-sensitive software components. Candidates with exposure to telecom (4G/5G), embedded, real\\-time, or large\\-scale system environments will be preferred.
 



  





**Core Skills (Mandatory)** 



* Design, develop, and maintain
 **high\\-performance, scalable C\\+\\+ applications** 
 using
 **C\\+\\+11 or later standards**
* Work extensively in
 **Linux\\-based environments** 
 for development, debugging, and deployment
* Implement and optimize
 **inter\\-process communication (IPC)** 
 mechanisms such as shared memory, message queues, semaphores, and signals
* Develop and maintain
 **socket\\-based applications** 
 using
 **TCP/IP protocols**
* Handle
 **memory management** 
 , performance tuning, and optimization for low\\-latency, high\\-throughput systems
* Analyze, debug, and resolve complex system\\-level issues using
 **GDB and other debugging/profiling tools**
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including system architects, QA, and product teams to deliver robust solutions
* Participate in
 **code reviews** 
 , design discussions, and architecture\\-level decision\\-making
* Ensure high code quality through adherence to
 **coding standards, best practices, and documentation**
* Contribute to troubleshooting, root cause analysis, and continuous improvement of existing systems



  





**Tools \\& Environment** 



* Strong hands\\-on experience in
 **C\\+\\+ (C\\+\\+11 or above)**
* Solid understanding of
 **Linux OS internals and system programming concepts**
* Proficiency in
 **IPC, socket programming, TCP/IP, and memory management**
* Experience with debugging, performance analysis, and system\\-level troubleshooting



  





**Experience \\& Qualification** 



* Experience: 3 to 8\\+ years in system software, C\\+\\+ development, or related roles
* Education: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Computer Science, Electronics, or related fields)



  





**What We Value** 



* Strong engineering fundamentals over narrow tool expertise
* Ability to work across code, systems, and integration layers
* Ownership mindset and experience handling real\\-world production issues
* Willingness to learn and adapt across domains



  





**To Apply:** 




  





 Send your CV to
 **aayushi@outlookwork.com** 




 Aayushi Sharma:
 **\\+91 80063 07272**

title: MERN Stack Developer
description:
This is a full\\-time role for a MERN Stack Developer. The MERN Stack Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining front\\-end and back\\-end web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. Responsibilities include building and integrating APIs, ensuring data security, optimizing application performance, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality software solutions. The candidate will also troubleshoot and debug issues to ensure seamless user experiences.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong proficiency in MERN stack technologies: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js
* Experience in front\\-end development, including JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and React.js
* Back\\-end development skills, including API design, implementation, and data handling
* Familiarity with database management, database querying, and optimization (MongoDB preferred)
* Proficiency in debugging, testing, and optimizing software applications
* Ability to use development tools, version control systems (e.g., Git), and collaboration platforms
* Strong problem\\-solving and communication skills for effective collaboration
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent practical experience)
* Experience with Agile methodologies, cloud platforms, or DevOps tools is a plus



  





**Connect over WhatsApp for all queries : 8104249856**

title: Senior Web Developer
description:
**Company Description**

 Shriram General Insurance Company Limited is a collaboration between Shriram Capital Limited, a key part of the renowned Shriram Group, and Sanlam Limited, a leading financial services group. Shriram Capital Limited holds 74% equity in the joint venture, while Sanlam Limited holds 26%. The company is committed to providing innovative and customer\\-centric insurance solutions, supported by the collective expertise of its parent organizations.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Senior Business Developer. The Senior Business Developer will be responsible for driving business growth by generating leads, conducting comprehensive market research, and developing strong client relationships. The role requires identifying new business opportunities, delivering exceptional customer service, and contributing to strategic business development plans.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Analytical Skills and Market Research to identify trends and opportunities
* Strong Communication and Customer Service skills to build and sustain client relationships
* Experience and expertise in Lead Generation strategies to drive business growth
* Proven ability to work independently and effectively in a remote setting
* Prior experience in the insurance or financial services sector is an advantage

title: Product Builder, Software Development Engineer
job_function: General Business, Management, and Business Development
description:
**Position: Founding Software Development Engineer (Equity\\-Based)** 




 Location: Remote
 



 Engagement Type: Equity\\-Only (Founding Role)
 



 Experience Required: Minimum 3 years
 



  





**About Kagaar:** 




 Kagaar is a unified community platform designed to turn high\\-quality ideas into real companies.
 



 We are building an early\\-stage, mission\\-driven product that fundamentally improves how founders, startups, creators, and investors connect, collaborate, and compound momentum.
 



  





 We are currently forming a lean founding team of exceptional engineers who will own core technical decisions and directly shape Kagaar’s product, systems, and long\\-term trajectory.
 



  





 This is not a conventional engineering role. As a Founding Software Development Engineer, you will operate as a true owner—driving critical technical decisions, building core product systems from the ground up, and partnering closely with leadership on execution and strategy.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Engineer who has previously built and shipped products in SaaS\\-based startup environments. The ideal candidate has worked in high\\-ownership, venture\\-backed companies, understands early\\-stage ambiguity, and has demonstrated the ability to take products from concept to production.
 



 This role is strictly equity\\-based and intended for individuals who are aligned with long\\-term value creation rather than short\\-term compensation.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Architect, design, develop, and deploy core full\\-stack features in a fast\\-paced startup environment.
* Build scalable, secure, and high\\-performance backend systems that can support rapid growth.
* Develop responsive, intuitive frontend interfaces with a strong emphasis on user experience.
* Take ownership of product features end\\-to\\-end, from technical design to production rollout.
* Collaborate closely with product, design, and leadership teams to align engineering with business goals.
* Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented production\\-grade code.
* Continuously evaluate and adopt modern development practices, tools, and frameworks where appropriate.



  





**Mandatory Requirements ( Non Negotiables ):** 




 Candidates must meet all of the following criteria to be considered:
 


* Minimum 3 years of professional experience as a Full Stack Engineer.
* Prior experience working at a SaaS\\-based startup, with direct involvement in building and shipping a real\\-world product.
* Experience at YC\\-backed companies or startups funded by top\\-tier venture capital firms (e.g., Y Combinator, Sequoia, a16z, Accel, Lightspeed, etc.).
* *This is a mandatory requirement.*
* Proven ability to work in early\\-stage environments with high ownership and minimal hand\\-holding.



  





**Technical Requirements:** 



* Strong proficiency in Next.js, React, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.
* Solid backend experience with Node.js and Express.js (Python or Java experience is a plus).
* Hands\\-on experience with databases such as MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or MySQL.
* Strong system design fundamentals and problem\\-solving skills.
* Ability to independently drive execution in a fully remote setup.
* Clear, concise communication skills with a bias toward action.



*Educational background from institutions such as IITs, IIITs, BITS, VIT, or equivalent is preferred but not mandatory.* 




  





**Why Join Kagaar:** 



* Be part of the founding engineering team, influencing both product and company direction from day one.
* Work with high autonomy in a fast\\-moving, outcome\\-driven environment.
* Gain meaningful founding equity tied directly to your long\\-term impact and ownership.
* Collaborate within a transparent, learning\\-focused, and execution\\-oriented culture.



  





**Equity \\& Compensation:** 




 This is a strictly equity\\-only role. There is no fixed salary or cash compensation at this stage.
 



 Founding equity allocation will be determined based on:
 


* Depth and relevance of prior startup and SaaS experience.
* Technical leadership and execution capability.
* Long\\-term commitment and alignment with Kagaar’s vision.



 This structure reflects our belief in shared ownership and long\\-term value creation.
 



  





**Important Note:** 




 This role is intended only for candidates who fully understand and are genuinely prepared for the risks, responsibilities, and expectations of an early\\-stage, equity\\-only startup role.
 



 If you are not aligned with this model, we respectfully request that you do not apply.
 



  





**Application Process:** 




 To apply:
 


* Email your resume and a brief cover letter to hireme@kagaar.in
* Complete the mandatory application form:



 https://forms.gle/n353TgozAn1R339u9
 



 We are looking for individuals who take initiative, build with conviction, and are committed to creating long\\-term value.
 


* — Team Kagaar

title: Sr Web Developer
description:
**The Sr Web Developer builds and maintains customer and partner portals using Salesforce Experience Cloud and modern web technologies. This role focuses on creating responsive, accessible interfaces with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like LWC or React. Responsibilities include integrating APIs, ensuring security and performance, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions. The developer also supports CI/CD processes, mentors team members, and promotes best practices in usability and accessibility.**
**Responsibilities**
* Oversee and drive the technical implementation of Blue Yonder websites including customer and partner portals.
* Develop and maintain responsive, accessible web interfaces using HyperText Markup Language (HTML), Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), and JavaScript.
* Design and implement complex front\\-end development using frameworks such as Lightning Web Component (LWC), React, Vue, or Angular.
* Develop scalable back\\-end services and integrations supporting Salesforce and connected enterprise systems.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams (Solution Architect, Software Engineers, Web Developers, UX Designer, and Product Owners) to define and deliver technical solutions.
* Ensure data integrity, security, and performance optimization across environments.
* Oversee code reviews, mentor junior, and intermediate developers, and uphold code quality standards.
* Contribute to Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines and automated testing for consistent release management.
* Promote accessibility, usability, and responsive design across all customer and partner interfaces.
* Oversee release management activities to ensure smooth deployments and minimal downtime.
* Translate business requirements into scalable technical architectures for Salesforce Experience Cloud.
* Maintain documentation of technical designs, data models, and component libraries.
* Architect and enforce performance optimization strategies, including caching, lazy loading, and code splitting.
* Ensure accessibility compliance (WCAG 2\\.1 AA or higher) and conduct accessibility audits.
* Lead automated testing initiatives and maintain test frameworks across multiple environments.
* Implement and document APIs, ensuring consistency, scalability, and proper versioning.
* Integrate analytics and monitoring tools to measure and improve portal performance and user experience.
* Drive continuous learning by mentoring developers, sharing best practices, and contributing to reusable code libraries.
* Stay current with vendor/platform releases, web frameworks, and security best practices.
* Ensure compliance with organizational data privacy, security, and regulatory standards.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.
* 5\\+ years of full stack web development experience with advanced proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks such as React or Lightning Web Components.
* Deep experience with Salesforce Experience Cloud or equivalent customer portal platform, including Apex development.
* Strong understanding of API integrations, data structures, and Salesforce security model.
* Experience with Git, CI/CD pipelines, and automated testing frameworks (such as Jest or Selenium).
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Demonstrated ability to mentor team members, collaborate across functions, and deliver scalable, secure solutions.
* Strong awareness of data compliance (GDPR, CCPA) and performance KPIs.
* Knowledge of design collaboration tools (e.g., Figma, Miro, etc. ) required.
* Salesforce Administrator or JavaScript Developer I certification preferred.


**Our Values**
 If you want to know the heart of a company, take a look at their values. Ours unite us. They are what drive our success – and the success of our customers. Does your heart beat like ours? Find out here: Core Values
   

  

 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.

title: Ubuntu Software Engineer
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1200\\+ colleagues in 75\\+ countries and very few office based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder led, profitable and growing.
   

  

 We are hiring engineers to work across the breadth of our Ubuntu Engineering organisation \\- engineers who care deeply for quality, performance and resilience in software, engineers who are just as comfortable with designing and engineering new software as they are with packaging, integrating, testing and shipping the incredible catalog of open source software provided by the Ubuntu repositories.
   

  

 Our engineers integrate the freshest open source software, provide robust upgrade paths and engineer the future of Ubuntu. Ubuntu is not just the world's most deployed open source operating system, it's a platform that enables innovation for millions of users across the globe. Our community represents the full breadth of the developer experience; from students, hobbyists and freelancers to high performance engineering and creative teams in corporate and academic environments.
   

  

 The four key teams that ship Ubuntu are:
   

  

* **Foundations** 
 : maintaining foundational software: architectures, package managers, compilers, toolchains, bootloaders, filesystems and core utilities
* **Server:** 
 leading the design, evolution and future of our Ubuntu Server distribution
* **Desktop:** 
 driving Ubuntu Desktop, our future immutable desktop: Ubuntu Core Desktop, WSL, gaming technology, and a suite of modern applications for the desktop crafted with Flutter
* **Debcrafters:** 
 a new team responsible for the forward movement, maintenance and overall health of the Ubuntu archive: one of the most abundant repositories of open source software available today


 Bring your existing expertise and learn new skills by working on one of the most prolific pieces of open source software. As an engineer working on Ubuntu you could work on any or all of the following categories:
   

  

* **Development** 
 : design, build and ship new foundational systems software and applications in Rust, Go, Flutter, and Python
* **Architecture** 
 : engineer the integration of open source from boot firmware to cloud applications deployment
* **Packaging** 
 : a combination of Debian and Snap packaging to ship software in the distribution
* **Automation** 
 : build and maintain the machinery responsible for building, testing and shipping Ubuntu
* **Distro Engineering** 
 : the maintenance and evolution of a Linux distribution and its repositories


 This application track is suitable for those at the mid point in their career but perhaps not quite at the Manager/Lead level, with relevant skills to contribute to Ubuntu.
   

  

 At Canonical, you will have the opportunity to engage with and contribute to the broader open source community. We're looking for individuals who can help build a thriving community and contribute with enthusiasm and precision to a broad range of technologies.
   

  

**Location** 
 : We have remote roles open in every time zone.
   

  

**The role entails**
 Based on the first round of interviews, we identify specific teams where you might be an excellent fit and conduct second\\-round interviews with those teams. Our engineers are:
   

  

* Designing, building and shipping software in Rust, Go and Python
* Packaging, integrating, testing and uploading open source software to the Ubuntu repositories
* Debugging system\\-level issues and delivering robust solutions
* Authoring and improving technical and community documentation
* Contributing to upstream and neighboring open source projects
* Collaborating as part of a globally distributed team
* Mentoring their colleagues to build skills and understanding
* Developing and improving processes to more efficiently fulfill our goals


**What we are looking for in you**
* An exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
* Undergraduate degree in Computer Science or STEM, or a compelling narrative about your alternative path
* Drive and a track record of going above and beyond expectations
* A demonstrated passion for open source software
* Significant experience with Rust, Go, Python, Flutter or C/C\\+\\+
* Professional written and spoken English
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Ability to travel twice a year, for company events up to two weeks each


**Nice\\-to\\-have skills**
* Experience with Linux distributions and distribution engineering
* Experience with software packaging and distribution mechanisms
* Understanding of build systems and toolchains, including for cross\\-compilation
* Performance or Security Engineering experience


**What we offer you**
 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognize outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance\\-driven annual bonus. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice\\-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Team Member Assistance Program \\& Wellness Platform
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence \\- in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Canonical has been a remote\\-first company since its inception in 2004\\. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Prognosis SME
description:
**About Company** 




  





 Our client is a trusted global innovator of IT and business services. We help clients transform through consulting, industry solutions, business process services, digital \\& IT modernization and managed services. Our client enables them, as well as society, to move confidently into the digital future. We are committed to our clients’ long\\-term success and combine global reach with local client attention to serve them in over 50 countries around the globe.
 



  





 Job Title: Prognosis SME
 



 Location: Bangalore
 



 Experience: 5\\+ yrs
 



 Job Type : Contract to hire
 



 Notice Period:\\- Immediate joiner
 



  





**Mandatory Skills** 




  




* We are seeking a Prognosis Subject Matter Expert (SME) to lead the upgrade of prognosis from version 11\\.9 to 12\\.3\\. The ideal candidate will have deep hands\\-on expertise with Prognosis, strong troubleshooting skills, and experience working with application, middleware, database, and infrastructure teams.



  




* Key Responsibilities
* Upgrade of Prognosis from version 11\\.9 to 12\\.3
* Act as the primary SME for Prognosis across projects and operations
* Design and implement end\\-to\\-end monitoring solutions using Prognosis
* Configure dashboards, alerts, KPIs, thresholds, and reports aligned with business SLAs
* Perform root cause analysis for performance, availability, and capacity issues
* Integrate Prognosis with other monitoring, logging, and ITSM tools
* Lead performance tuning and optimization initiatives
* Provide technical guidance, mentoring, and knowledge transfer to teams
* Support production incidents and problem management activities
* Collaborate with application, infrastructure, network, and database teams
* Create and maintain documentation, SOPs, and best practices
* Participate in client discussions, solution design workshops, and architecture reviews



  




* Required Skills \\& Experience
* Strong hands\\-on experience with Prognosis (APM / Infrastructure Monitoring)
* Experience with prognosis version 11\\.9 and 12\\.3
* Expertise in windows administration
* Expertise in performance analysis, capacity planning, and RCA
* Knowledge of ITIL processes (Incident, Problem, Change)
* Experience in enterprise or large\\-scale environments

title: Dotnet Architect
description:
**About the Company** 




 Acuity Analytics is committed to delivering innovative solutions in the financial technology space, focusing on enhancing trading workflows and ensuring secure, efficient operations.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 The role requires a seasoned software engineer with extensive experience in .NET / C\\# and architecture ownership, responsible for building and maintaining a scalable FIX connectivity platform.
 



  





  





**Responsibilities** 



* Architect and deliver a scalable FIX connectivity platform (client/server, initiator/acceptor) supporting multiple counterparties and venues.
* Define hot\\-path performance patterns (zero/low allocations, object pooling, efficient parsing/encoding, deterministic latency).
* Build session management, message routing, sequencing, resend/replay, and store\\-and\\-forward mechanisms aligned to FIX standards.
* Implement message normalization and canonical domain models (orders, RFQs, executions, allocations).
* Integrate with trading platforms/venues (e.g., Bloomberg TOMS, Tradeweb) and internal systems via FIX and/or messaging layers (Kafka, MQ).
* Establish secure connectivity (TLS, cert management, key rotation), auditability, and full observability (metrics, tracing, log correlation).
* Define HA/DR architecture (active\\-active / active\\-passive), failover strategy, and resilience testing.
* Own engineering standards: code reviews, performance benchmarks, capacity planning, release automation, and runbooks.
* Mentor engineers and collaborate with product, trading, and operations stakeholders.



  









**Qualifications** 




 8\\+ years in software engineering with strong experience in .NET / C\\# and architecture ownership.
 



  





**Required Skills** 



* Proven experience building FIX protocol integrations (FIX 4\\.2/4\\.4/5\\.0\\), including sequencing, session state, replay/resend, and drop\\-copy concepts.
* Strong understanding of capital markets trading workflows (RFQ, order/execution lifecycle, allocations, post\\-trade flows).
* Experience with low\\-latency engineering: profiling, GC tuning, latency benchmarking, and high performance orchestration.
* Solid experience with distributed systems, concurrency, and fault\\-tolerant design.
* Strong knowledge of security in financial systems (TLS, certs, secure configuration, secrets management).



  









**Preferred Skills** 



* Direct integration experience with Bloomberg TOMS and/or Tradeweb connectivity patterns.
* Familiarity with FIX engines/libraries (e.g., QuickFIX/QuickFIXn or equivalent) and when to extend vs build.
* Experience with Kafka, MQ, Redpanda.
* Linux \\+ containerization (Docker/Kubernetes) and production operations in on\\-prem / hybrid environments.
* gRPC, WebSockets, or binary protocols for internal distribution.
* Cloud exposure (Azure/AWS), especially for observability and secure networking.



  









**Pay range and compensation package** 




 Competitive salary based on experience and qualifications.
 



  





**Equal Opportunity Statement** 




 Acuity Analytics is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusivity in the workplace.

title: Senior Principal Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Oracle’s Cloud is a ground\\-up effort to build Infrastructure and Platform as a Service that operate at high scale in a broadly distributed multi\\-tenant cloud environment. Our customers run their businesses on our cloud, and our mission is to provide them with best\\-in\\-class compute, storage, networking, database, security, and an ever\\-expanding set of cloud\\-based services. For more information, please check
 **https://cloud.oracle.com/home**
 Fusion Applications (http://www.oracle.com/us/products/applications/overview/index.html) are designed and developed ground up, to host the entire enterprise in the cloud. Our team Fusion Release Engineering (FRE) is a central portfolio team for Fusion Applications Development that specializes in CI/CD platform and continuous integration between Fusion Applications, Middleware and RDBMS. We specialize in SaaS and Cloud automation as well as server side abstraction frameworks.
   

  

 We’re seeking dynamic people in this high\\-profile, agile development team.
   

  

 As a member of the software engineering division, you will take an active role in the definition and evolution of standard practices and procedures. Define specifications for significant new projects and specify, design and develop software according to those specifications. You will perform professional software development tasks associated with the developing, designing and debugging of software applications or operating systems.
   

  

 Provide leadership and expertise in the development of new products/services/processes, frequently operating at the leading edge of technology. Recommends and justifies major changes to existing products/services/processes. BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. 10 or more years of software engineering or related experience.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The ideal candidate will demonstrate strong skills in several of the following areas:
   

  

* BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent with 10\\+ years of experience
* Demonstrable Computer science fundamentals, object\\-oriented design, and Java programming
* Large scale SaaS/PaaS based cloud native enterprise application development experience is highly desired.
* Work in an Agile devops continuous delivery development environment with geographically distributed teams is highly desired.
* Strong full stack Programming experience in Java, Javascript, python, perl/shel scripting, Oracle RDBMS (SQL and NOSQL) is highly desired
* Very good understanding of Micro\\-services based architecture, working knowledge in Docker and Kubernetes is highly desired
* Very good experience in CI/CD processes and tools like Jenkins and Git is highly desired.
* Web GUI development Tools/Frameworks experience (Angular, react, OJet) is desirable.
* Familiarity with AI techniques and ML concepts are desired
* Strong problem solving and communication skills
* Automation \\& tool development for monitoring \\& managing large\\-scale systems is a plus
* Expertise in developing and operating highly scalable \\& available systems is highly desired
* Soft Skills :
+ Must be independent, self\\-motivated and a team player
+ Ability to communicate with people of different cultural and language background
+ Must work well under pressure on multiple projects.


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC5
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Python Software Engineer - Ubuntu Hardware Certification Team
description:
Canonical is hiring a Python Software Engineer to join the Certification team, who make the tools which enable us to know that a desktop, laptop, server or IoT device is working properly. We work at the interface of hardware and software, so the ideal candidate is a Python developer familiar with hardware.
   

  

 The Certification team develops the tools needed to certify hardware as working with Ubuntu Core as well as Ubuntu Desktop and Server: https://ubuntu.com/certified
   

  

 We design hardware which can be used to probe devices independently, and frameworks for software tests that check every aspect of Ubuntu on that hardware.
   

  

 This is an excellent opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact for adoption of Linux across multiple device categories and industries. Canonical offers a fun, fast\\-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development opportunities. This team is centered in EMEA time zones, and works with colleagues on related teams in both the Americas and APAC.
   

  

 We work together with silicon companies, OEMs, ODMs and teams within Canonical to ensure a smooth, secure out of the box Ubuntu experience, with success in this role leading to a great Ubuntu experience being offered on more and more devices.
   

  

 Role description
   

  

 We are looking for a self\\-motivated software engineer with experience developing in Python, to work on test automation tools or Linux based embedded hardware. This role offers an exciting opportunity to push the industry forward by enabling entirely new Linux based hardware testing capabilities, scaling up hardware certification efforts and allowing for deeper test coverage.
   

  

 The role involves the development and maintenance of Canonical's open source certification tools, supporting the creation of hardware solutions for test automation, and automating our existing processes. We seek out continuous process and tooling improvements as part of expanding the certification test suites, ultimately to improve the quality of Linux experience felt by millions of Linux end users.
   

  

 Key responsibilities
   

  

* Maintain and develop new features to our Python based test automation tools like Checkbox, used by both in\\-house teams and industry partners.
* Invent new ways to enable remote, automated testing.
* Help build the software counterpart to in\\-house designed testing hardware to help test device enablement (graphics, hotplug, bluetooth, etc).
* Write functional and performance tests to support hardware enablement and to protect from regressions.
* Participate in meetings involving international travel 2\\-3 times per year.


**Required Skills And Experience**
* Knowledge of Python programming language.
* Quality oriented, pragmatic approach to software design and implementation.
* Interest in test automation methodologies.
* Previous experience working with Ubuntu or other Linux distributions.
* Ability to be productive in a globally distributed team.


**Desired Skills And Experience**
* Passion for tinkering: you are a maker.
* Experience working in an agile environment.
* Hardware testing experience, for example in the IoT space.
* Familiarity with the C programming language.


 What is Canonical?
   

  

 Canonical is a growing international software company that works with the open\\-source community to deliver Ubuntu, "the world's best free software platform". Our services help businesses worldwide to reduce costs, improve efficiency and enhance security with Ubuntu.
   

  

*We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.*
 \\#Stack

Founded in 1996, with a revenue of $1\\.8B, with 35,000\\+ associates worldwide, specializes in digital engineering, and IT services company helping clients modernize their technology infrastructure, adopt cloud and AI solutions, and accelerate innovation. title: Senior Perfomance Engineer (Cloud Applications)
description:
**Job Description**
**Fusion Application (SaaS) Performance, Scalability \\& Benchmark (PSR)** 
 group works with applications development organization to maximize the performance of the Fusion Application (FA) SaaS cloud products. We review and approve proposed designs, participate actively in evolving development processes, performance guidelines and best practices for the FA development organization. Test the performance of the product to identify performance problems with the product, recommend performance resolution to solve these problems and if needed perform POC with the proposed solution. We produce benchmarks, sizing , toolkits and performance whitepapers.
   

  

 Apart from this the group also review the fleet wide customer patterns to ensure overall performance, stability for the product by developing tools, solutions which helps in rapid triage, proactive observation and analysis.
   

  

 Senior Performance Engineer with a passion to improve the performance and quality of SaaS product. Leverage your extensive implementation and design experience, proven Linux OS, Java/CPP, SQL, OAC/OBIEE/BIP platform tuning of large, complex analytic applications to Identify, analyze and provide recommended solution quickly for performance issues encountered with the product.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**The responsibilities will include:**
* Understand/gather performance test requirements, prepare suitable test case and test plan. Complete ownership and responsibility on setup, configuration, administration, data loading and tuning the BI environment
* Analyze application performance and identifies issues by installing the required environment, executing the required test cases, identify the slow performing areas, review and provide potential solutions to these issues with due impact analysis.
* Work on critical customer performance issues / cloud fleet patterns and provide short term solutions and root cause analysis.
* Execute performance test using tools like (JMeter/Gatling/Shell Scripts/Python) for various UI, batch, micro benchmark analytics use case. Collect respect performance metrics and publish test results.
* Profile the relevant techstack (UI, Java, Weblogic Server, DB, C/CPP, Linux OS) to identify the bottleneck, raise bugs, followup with development team for further explanation and agreement to solve the issue.
* Analyze UI performance by using devtools, covering CPU, Memory, response time issues and well versed with single page application (SPA) architecture
* Analyze backend heapdump, thread dumps, JFRs, OS system process / thread analysis etc.
* Develop tools using JavaScript/TypeScript, Java, Python, shell scripts for overall productivity of the day to day task. Should be comfortable with writing code (any language).


**Desired Profile : (Java Script/System/Load test)**
* A self motivated person who loves technology and can quickly adapt to new tools/technologies and provide recommendations for the same in the ever changing cloud landscape.
* Ability to profile a system from UI , application, OS/Storage with strong UI, Linux , Java,WLS and database.
* Master of performance testing, tuning \\& benchmarks concepts and methodologies.
* Experience working with SPA UI architecture and performance tuning activities for any UI framework (Angular, React, KnockOut etc) would be a added advantage, if its a cloud BI tool or platform even better.
* Experience working with Server side performance tuning activities for any integration, analytics platform.
* Experience working any other database (SQL, noSQL), Data platform (Pipeline, ETL, replication) and reporting tools (Tabelau, MS PowerBI etc)
* Experience working on microservices architecture based systems.
* Medium to advance level UNIX administration skills is a must.
* Usage of GenAI, ML , Agentic system will be an added advantage.


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC4
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
